jobDescription: Become part of the Lockheed Martin team and bring your expertise as the Supply Chain Business Process Analyst. Your responsibilities will include assisting with the translating of program and supply chain requirements and directives into executable data trending and reporting methodologies, tools, and deliverables. Additionally, you will support the creation of specification requirements based upon customer needs as well as set up the programming necessary to provide the end customer the datasets and trending information needed to make business decisions and track progress to established targets. This may include creating and maintaining multiple databases for user input and collection of data and trends. You will be involved with synthesizing data and data relationships from Systems, Applications and Processes (SAP) and other data sources, and have proven experience with compiling data from those sources into a customer friendly format. You will be responsible to leverage project management skills to drive the creation and execution of improvement plans. You must be able to be flexible and balance priorities to support goals and targets while providing the customer answers and data in support of business decisions. Selected individual will support Sustainment Analytics Team as Supply Chain SME and responsible for analyzing Sustainment performance improvement opportunities to align SCM's ability to execute.Must be a US Citizen or legally authorized to work in US as a permanent resident.
